definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: old age—[[זִקְנׇה]] Ps 71:9 + 2 t.; cstr. [[זִקְנַת]] 1Ki 11:4; sf. [[זִקְנׇתוֹ]] 1Ki 15:23; [[זִקְנׇתָָהּ]] Ge 24:36; —old age, ‖[[שֵׂיבָה]] Ps 71:18, Is 46:4; in the time of old age ´[[לְעֵת ז]] 1Ki 11:4, 1Ki 15:23, Ps 71:9; ´[[אַחֲרֵי ז]] (i.e. after she had become old) Ge 24:36 (J).
